# store.prim.sh

> Object storage for agents. S3-compatible buckets and objects with x402 payment.

Base URL: https://store.prim.sh
Auth: x402 (USDC on Base Sepolia)

## Endpoints

- `POST /v1/buckets` — create a bucket. **$0.05**
- `GET /v1/buckets` — list your buckets. **$0.001**
- `GET /v1/buckets/:id` — get bucket details. **$0.001**
- `DELETE /v1/buckets/:id` — delete a bucket (must be empty). **$0.01**
- `PUT /v1/buckets/:id/objects/:key` — upload an object. **$0.001**
- `GET /v1/buckets/:id/objects` — list objects in a bucket. **$0.001**
- `GET /v1/buckets/:id/objects/:key` — download an object. **$0.001**
- `DELETE /v1/buckets/:id/objects/:key` — delete an object. **$0.001**
- `GET /v1/buckets/:id/quota` — get quota and usage. **$0.001**
- `PUT /v1/buckets/:id/quota` — set bucket quota. **$0.01**

## Limits (beta)

- 10 buckets per wallet
- 100 MB default per-bucket quota
- 1 GB total storage per wallet

## Examples

```bash
# Create a bucket
curl -X POST https://store.prim.sh/v1/buckets \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"name": "agent-data"}'
# → 402 Payment Required (sign and retry with PAYMENT-SIGNATURE header)

# Upload an object
curl -X PUT https://store.prim.sh/v1/buckets/BUCKET_ID/objects/notes.txt \
  -H "Content-Type: text/plain" \
  -H "Content-Length: 13" \
  --data-binary "hello world\n"

# Download an object
curl https://store.prim.sh/v1/buckets/BUCKET_ID/objects/notes.txt
```
